metadataAttributes.Title: Bayesian Statistics Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Bayesian Statistics for Modeling and Prediction. Learn the foundations and practice your data analysis skills.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Bayesian Statistics, Data Science, R Programming, Data Analysis, Statistics, Bayesian Inference, Gibbs Sampling, Markov Model, Mixture Model, Forecasting, Dynamic Linear Modeling, Time Series,
